planet.name: CFBDSIR2149
planet.description: This planet is an orphan planet, that means it is not orbiting any star. Some people therefore believe it should not be called planet. The object is assosiacted wth the AB Doradus moving groups which allows astronomers to determine its age an therefore its mass.
planet.imagedescription:
Artist's impression of the free-floating planet CFBDSIR J214947.2-040308.9
ESO/L. Calcada/P. Delorme/Nick Risinger (skysurvey.org)/R. Saito/VVV Consortium
